experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Infosys
workDescription: Created LEAP, a cloud-based platform using React and JavaScript, adopted by 100+ clients globally.
Enhanced mobile accessibility with Kotlin in Android Studio, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement.
Developed a predictive model in Python (Linear Regression) for a sports company, boosting inventory turnover by 20%.
Integrated Jenkins with Mocha for automated testing, reducing manual testing by 30% and increasing coverage by 20%.
Developed a secure web application for an online marketplace with ReactJS, JWT, and OAuth 2.0.
Integrated Elasticsearch for search functionality and payment gateways, improving response time by 50% and increasing transactions by ~60%.
Implemented a recommendation engine (k-NN) in Python, leading to a 20% increase in conversion rates.
